titleStmt.title: Psittacorum regio, the land of parrots, or, The she-lands with a description of other strange adjacent countries in the dominions of Prince de l'Amour, not hitherto found in any geographical map / by one of the late most reputed wits.

Psittacorum regio, the land of parrots, or, The she-lands with a description of other strange adjacent countries in the dominions of Prince de l'Amour, not hitherto found in any geographical map / by one of the late most reputed wits.
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.
Quevedo, Francisco de, 1580-1645.

biblFull.extent: [2], 156, [1] p., [1] folded leaf of plates : ill.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Kirkman and are to sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: This work was listed by Wing under both Joseph Hall and Francisco de Quevedo. It appears on reel 1124:20 as H401A, and on reel 1365:15 as Q193. Both Wing numbers are cancelled in Wing (CD-ROM, 1996), and replaced with P4148D.
Reproduction of originals in the Huntington Library and the Bodleian Library.
